_sText:
The updated LostTemple, De\_LostTemple\_Pro, has several major changes that will impact overall game-play of the map:

The main tunnel, leading the terrorists to the temple steps, has been altered to allow the terrorists a slightly better approach to middle. 


Several other, not so major changes have also been made:

<li>* Echoes have been fixed and are included in the .bsp
<li>* There is no longer steam rising from B halls, you can now awp without drastic FPS drops
<li>* CTs can now hide behind the tree on the ledge by the swamp
<li>* You can now run behind the propane tent in A without having to jump
<li>* Mini-map bombsite locations now correspond with the actual bombsite
<li>* You can now walk on the raised level in B ('Grassy knoll')
<li>* You can now flash/nade/smoke over 99% of the walls in the map.
<li>* Skybox has been raised in some areas to allow more room to jump and run
<li>* file size compressed by 30% 

Thanks to CEVO|Stevens for helping to optimize de\_losttemple to de\_losttemple\_pro!

by Magikus

Documentation: http://www.cevolved.com/?page=forum&func=viewthread&id=4354&forumID=35

Original: http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/6689

http://d00ds.com/
